item.title: Managing credentials in production
item.description: Every software must deal and manage credentials at some point. I will define credentials in the context of this article as secrets that must be protected at all costs, under risk of seriously compromising the security of production systems. There are several points to have in mind when managing credentials of productions systems: Credentials storage should be kept secret by encryption and a strong access management. Credentials must never be transported but stored.
